lead_paragraph: Kristina Mladenovic and Caroline Garcia can play for France in the Fed Cup final against the Czech Republic after the French tennis federation lifted their ban on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Mladenovic and Garcia Cleared to Play in Fed Cup Final
headline.main: Mladenovic and Garcia Cleared to Play in Fed Cup Final

snippet: Kristina Mladenovic and Caroline Garcia can play for France in the Fed Cup final against the Czech Republic after the French tennis federation lifted their ban on Saturday....
